alert.note: Alert for Big Stone (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 21 at 9:19AM CDT until April 24 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...South Dakota... Minnesota River near Big Stone Lake affecting Grant, Roberts and Big Stone Counties. Minnesota River at Ortonville affecting Big Stone County. .For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River Big Stone Lake. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 971.6 feet, Water reaches shoreline homes on Shady Oak Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 971.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 AM CDT Friday was 971.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Monday morning and continue falling to 971.0 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 971.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Saturday evening by 530 PM CDT.
